title: Lovesick

fields.name: Trigger:
fields.value: Someone is affecting you with a positive effect

desc:
Post 2296
__Can be played without triggering the trigger__
* Bind yourself and another player together as with the game modifier 5.1. You have 2 ID zones.
* If the trigger of this card has been triggered, whoever triggered it, this will be played on automaticly.

The person this has been played on may at any time decide to cut their connection with you, giving each player 50% of the cards held. In cases where 1 person would have more cards than the other, 1 random card will be automaticly played without a target.Afterwards, the person that cut their connection draws 5 additional cards.
